attributes.action: Demand the immediate removal of Rishi Sunak on the grounds of no confidence
attributes.additional_details:
On the grounds of the following

Mismanagement of the countries finances leading to the cost of living crisis

As chancellor he did not actively recover grants from bogus companies

Exacerbating child poverty by 500,000

Unreasonable cuts on benefits of those most vulnerable

Breaking the law that he is meant to uphold, being served fixed penalty notices

Raising taxes 

With recent events and a rash decision to go ahead with the banning of XL bullies without due diligence and expert evidence
attributes.background: We call upon our elected MPs to vote the current Prime Minister, Rishi Sunak out of office

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
